body_html: @karmel I'm requesting for that op to be implemented. I'm trying to design an Android app that uses ML Kit for image labelling on my custom dataset. To reduce the model size, I'm using quantised mobilenet architecture and ML Kit accepts tflite files. I'm getting that error when trying to convert .pb to .tflite. Do you suggest any workaround alternatively?
